summary: A modern, gothic tale of crime and redemption about an aging police officer from a small Ontario Mennonite town who hides a violent past until a local murder upsets the calm of his newly reformed life.
cast: Jill Hennessy|Amy Rutherford|Peter Stormare|Vladimir Bondarenko|Stephen Eric McIntyre|Martha Plimpton|Aaron Poole|Ari Cohen|Trent McMullen|Erin Brandenburg|Kat Germain|Jessica Clement|Andrew Penner|Alan Penner|John Penner|Herm Dick|Alexandria Benoit|Mark Snowdon|Timm Zemanek|Jackie Burroughs|Ann Holloway|Stuart Hughes|Alyssa Mariano|Heather Allin|Gordon Bolan|John Stead|Colin Burrowes|Sean Eaton|Heidi Burrowes|Liam Burrowes|Emily Schooley
title: Small Town Murder Songs
